original_text: And Joshua wrote these words in the Book of the Law of God. And he took a large stone and set it up there under the terebinth that was by the sanctuary of the Lord.
korean_text: 여호수아가 이 모든 말씀을 하나님의 율법책에 기록하고 큰 돌을 가져다가 거기 여호와의 성소 곁에 있는 상수리나무 아래에 세우고

sentences.original_text: And Joshua wrote these words in the Book of the Law of God.
sentences.korean_translation: 여호수아가 하나님의 율법책에 이 말들을 기록하였다.

sentences.original_text: And he took a large stone
that was by the sanctuary of the Lord.
